channel.title: This Week In Pony on Pony
channel.description: Recent content in This Week In Pony on Pony

item.title: This Week in Pony - March 28, 2017
item.description: This Week In Pony is a weekly blog post to catch you up on the latest news for the Pony programming language. To learn more about Pony check out our website, our Twitter account @ponylang, or join us on IRC. Items of note Version 0.11.4 Released! Version 0.11.4 has been released, with the full release notes here News and Blog Posts Pony Community Survey Hello Wallaroo! A brief introduction to Sendence’s Wallaroo, written in Pony.
